name: Chicken Pasta Salad Plates with Warm Garlic Baguette and Apple Slices
description: Heat-and-eat chicken pasta salad with a quick-warmed garlic baguette and fresh apple slices for a kid-friendly, no-heat-flavor dinner.
prep_steps: Gather chicken pasta salad, garlic baguette, and apples.
Rinse apples and slice into wedges.
Place chicken pasta salad portions onto plates or bowls.
If using an oven instead of the microwave, preheat it now per baguette pack directions (optional).
cook_steps: Warm the garlic baguette: microwave per pack directions until hot (typically 1–2 minutes), or bake in a preheated oven as directed if preferred.
Slice the warmed baguette and place in a basket or on a plate.
Add apple slices to each plate alongside the chicken pasta salad.

Slice the warmed baguette and place in a basket or on a plate.
Add apple slices to each plate alongside the chicken pasta salad.
